name: OddBallers
detailed_description:
OddBallers is a fast and frantic dodgeball party game that will put skills and friendships to the test. Take down your best-worst frenemies in epic brawls (local or online) where everything goes! Will you be victorious or go out with a ‘BAM!’… and drop a bathtub on your opponent as revenge!


  • Magnificent multiplayer mayhem for up to 6 friends
  • Use superior technique to outplay your opponents... or knock them off a roof with brutally devious tactics
  • Assault remaining players from the sidelines with tricky hazards - from ball cannons and explosives to falling bathtubs and blowing winds
  • Wonderfully wacky and highly dynamic arenas will keep you on your toes… or knock you out before your opponents get the chance
  • Shoot, crush, burn, push or drown your opponents - you may even discover ways to victory we never thought of
  • Multiple game modes for teams and FFA
